ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: hey there, awesome, awesome tools and service! I'm switching projects and teams to zeitHQ right now but I noticed something weird. Go to any deeper path in a single page app, refresh the browser and you'll get a 404. I get a 404 whenever I try to access a path other than the root, when using client side routing via history API. Can you push me into the right direction how to fix this? While it would work, I'd rather not use the hashbang hack `https://myapp.io//#/path`.
